def data.objects.creatures.darkclone.DarkClone.processCollision (   self,
  collision 
)

Handle running into something.

Use self.adjustCollision() to modify ejection vectors and distances; use self.hit[Floor|Wall|Ceiling] to react to running into terrain of those types.

Reimplemented from physicsobject.PhysicsObject.

data.objects.creatures.darkclone.DarkClone.prevAttackId

Id of previous attack that hit us, to prevent attacks from dealing damage more than once.

Todo:
This allows two simultaneous attacks to rapidly deal damage.

data.objects.creatures.darkclone.DarkClone.runDirection

Direction creature is trying to move in.

Set this to -1 to move left, 0 to not move, or 1 to move right.

Reimplemented from terrestrialobject.TerrestrialObject.
